author: wn.com
title: Trade and Industry Portfolio Committee Hears about NCR Raids on Businesses (Parliament of South Africa) ...
text: ( Source : Parliament of South Africa ) The Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry heard yesterday that the National Credit Regulator ( NCR ) will increased its raids on businesses to uncover crimes such as withholding clients' identity
